protocol_name: Cross-linking of IgG to Protein A or G Beads (S1425/S1430)
protocol_name_html: Cross-linking of IgG to Protein A or G Beads (S1425/S1430)
description: This protocol consists of an IgG purification step followed by covalent cross-linking of the IgG to the Protein A/G solid support. For IgG that has been previously purified, proceed directly to the cross-linking protocol.
keywords: Protein A, Protein G, cross-linkage, cross linked, covalent cross-linking of the IgG to protein A/G, igG purification to beads
guidelines:
Overview

Materials Needed: 

Protein A (NEB #S1425S ) or Protein G (NEB #S1430S ) Magnetic Beads 
Elution Buffer: 0.1 M glycine-HCl (pH 2.5) 
Binding Buffer: 0.1 M NaPhosphate Buffer (pH 8.0)
Dimethyl pimelidate dihydrochloride (Sigma, D-8388) dissolved at 25 mM in Cross-linking Buffer. 
Cross-linking Buffer: 0.2 M triethanolamine (pH 8.2) 
Blocking Buffer: 0.1 M ethanolamine (pH 8.2) 
Immunoglobulin in Binding Buffer 

This protocol consists of an IgG purification step followed by covalent cross-linking of the IgG to the Protein A/G solid support. For IgG that has been previously purified, proceed directly to the cross-linking protocol.

components.data: Vortex and thoroughly resuspend Protein A Magnetic Beads
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Vortex and thoroughly resuspend Protein A Magnetic Beads

components.data: Aliquot 100 μl of bead suspension to a sterile microcentrifuge tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Aliquot 100 μl of bead suspension to a sterile microcentrifuge tube

components.data: (wash #1) Apply magnet for 30 seconds, to pull beads to the side of the tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: (wash #1) Apply magnet for 30 seconds, to pull beads to the side of the tube

components.data: (wash #2) Apply magnet for 30 seconds, to pull beads to the side of the tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: (wash #2) Apply magnet for 30 seconds, to pull beads to the side of the tube

components.data: Add to the beads 80 μl of 0.1 M NaPhosphate Buffer (pH 8.0)
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add to the beads 80 μl of 0.1 M NaPhosphate Buffer (pH 8.0)

components.data: Add 15-25 μl of serum OR 20 μg purified IgG in a maximum volume of 30 μl
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 15-25 μl of serum OR 20 μg purified IgG in a maximum volume of 30 μl

components.data: Mix thoroughly and incubate at 4°C with agitation for 30 minutes
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Mix thoroughly and incubate at 4°C with agitation for 30 minutes

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 26 of Cross-linking of IgG to Protein A or G Beads (S1425/S1430)
source_data.protocol_name: Cross-linking of IgG to Protein A or G Beads (S1425/S1430)
source_data.protocol_name_html: Cross-linking of IgG to Protein A or G Beads (S1425/S1430)
source_data.annotation: At this point the purified IgG can be eluted from the beads or used directly for immunoprecipitation of target proteins. The purified IgG can also be cross-linked to the Protein A beads (see cross-linking protocol) to create a reusable immunoprecipitation bead which prevents the co-elution of antibody with target protein.
source_data.thread_text: At this point the purified IgG can be eluted from the beads or used directly for immunoprecipitation of target proteins. The purified IgG can also be cross-linked to the Protein A beads (see cross-linking protocol) to create a reusable immunoprecipitation bead which prevents the co-elution of antibody with target protein.
source_data.body: At this point the purified IgG can be eluted from the beads or used directly for immunoprecipitation of target proteins. The purified IgG can also be cross-linked to the Protein A beads (see cross-linking protocol) to create a reusable immunoprecipitation bead which prevents the co-elution of antibody with target protein.

components.data: Add 1 ml of Cross-linking Buffer (0.2 M triethanolamine, [pH 8.2]) to the Protein A/G immobilized antibody (wash a)
components.name: Description
